verses.roman:
sarvatra 'vyāpaka' prabhura sadā sarvatra vāsa
ihāte saṁśaya yāra, sei yāya nāśa

synonyms: sarvatra—everywhere; vyāpaka—pervading; prabhura—of the Supreme Personality of Godhead; sadā—always; sarvatra—everywhere; vāsa—residence; ihāte—about this; saṁśaya—doubt; yāra—of whom; sei—he; yāya nāśa—becomes annihilated.
translation: The Supreme Personality of Godhead is all-pervasive, and therefore He resides everywhere. Anyone who doubts this will be annihilated.
